prompts: Create a rock-type Pokemon with a sturdy build and boulder-like features.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a massive turtle made of stone with a fierce expression.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies strength and durability, with a rocky exterior.
Make a Pokemon with a round, rocky body and small limbs, perfect for defense.
Imagine a Pokemon with a tough, earthy appearance, known for its resilience in battles.
Design a Pokemon that looks like a living mountain, with a color palette of grays and browns.
Give me a Pokemon that exudes power and stability, resembling a boulder on legs.
